alert.note: Alert for Clay; Dickinson; Morris (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 21 at 8:27PM CDT until June 22 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR EASTERN DICKINSON...GEARY...SOUTHWESTERN RILEY...WESTERN MORRIS AND SOUTHERN CLAY COUNTIES... At 827 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles north of Wakefield to 5 miles south of Ogden to near Council Grove Lake, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Junction City, Herington, Ogden, Grandview Plaza, Wakefield, White City, Milford, Dwight, Wilsey, Parkerville, Latimer and Milford Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 287 and 308. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
